phrases: Well, your father always picks you up, right?
Everyone has a mother and father.
You do not need a dad!
It takes one to know one.
Kouki-kun, do you just live with your mother?
My dad went off somewhere, and then they got a divorce.
Maybe my mother is gone because she got a divorce...
If you do not wear your hat, they will get mad at you.
He is here to pick you up!
What do you feel like having for dinner?
Your mother's here to pick you up!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
At home, she is a noisy old woman!
Apparently, Rin always looks after Kouki...
My son can be a little abrasive, so he is had trouble making friends...
Maybe it is like birds of a feather flock together, huh?
You were just talking about me, were not you?!
I was not saying anything bad.
I do not want you to demand that I carry you half the way again...
Oh, I am not her father.
I am more like a relative, or...
I-I am sorry, what was I thinking?!
It is nice that you made a friend, huh?
Kouki-san said he does not have a father.
He said his father went somewhere after the divorce.
If God finds out, He punishes the people, does not he?
I wonder if my mom is gone because of divorce, too...
Do you want to meet her?
If she is like Kouki-kun's mother, I think I want to meet her!
Grandpa's maid is probably Rin's mother.
Have you heard anything about the maid?
I am sorry it is taken so long.
Winter clothing orders have finally settled down, so...
But I just cannot go out at night.
Are you telling me you have not gone out drinking once since...?
And I do not even care about drinking and that stuff anymore.
Anyway, the people in my shipping department are young,
but a lot of them have kids.
So it is not customary to go out drinking...
I got to pick up the kid at nursery school, anyway.
We had two kids in two years and the younger is 3 months old,
so if I do not get home quick, my wife...
When she gets mad, she is one scary monster...
I heard about the farewell party!
Yeah, but I cannot go out at night, so...
But they went to the trouble of arranging it,
so how about bringing the kid along?
Is this your way of saying that you want to go out drinking once in a while?
Anyway, anyway, it will be fine!
I am looking forward to it!
It seems Grandpa had a regular maid, sent from an agency...
So, do you know her name?
Yoshii Masako-san, spelled with the kanji for correct and child.
That is the name that is on the mother-child health record book, is not it?
Do you mean to contact her?!
You saw the health record book, right?
There is a lot written in there...
There is still so much we do not know, so...
I do not know the difference anymore between work and home...
Get away from me, you drunk!
I am glad you are here, Rin-chan.
Rin-chan is a beauty, is not she?
Yep, she sure is a beauty!
Yuu-kun, I will gather it together for you.
Rin might sleep on the way home, so...
Rin, I am going to the washroom.
Yeah, yeah, I am going to the bathroom.
He left our section high and dry.
It is like, do not produce results, then bail!
Quitting while you are ahead is playing dirty!
Sales has been tough this month...
Even if we do a decent job selling,
management will not look at anything but last year's results!
What are we going to do?
The old me would have stormed in and read them the riot act, but...
I am about to spring a leak...
I want to make you my kid!
What is really important to me has changed.
After seeing Rin-chan, I have come around.
I want to hold her forever!
Gotou-san, Rin-chan does not want to be held!
What did you think about your child... about Rin?
Yuu-kun was really cute, was not he?
You sure do love little kids, huh?
Says this is an elementary school admission information session.
I did not even do anything and this came...
There is an admissions test, is not there?
You can get in without taking any test!
Daikichi, are we going to make it in time?
The childrens' name tags can be turned around,
and they will be on the way home from school, so their names are not visible.
Another thing, tell your child not to be alone at a park, for example,
and even if they see an adult that they know, not to go off with that person.
It is tough, is not it?
Instead of telling them to trust people,
we have to teach them to be suspicious.
That one sheet we were given...
How do you know what vaccinations were given up till now?
Seems like I just asked an outlandish question...
Do you have Rin-chan's health record book?
It is got a vaccination record page.
I really do not know anything...
See, I just met Rin for the first time about 3 months ago...
I got the feeling that Rin-chan trusts in you implicitly, Daikichi-san...
I am not sure about that...
At home, she talks back a lot and she is a nag...
That is proof she trusts you.
It is obvious you are every bit a family.
I just jumped over your shadow!
She is got almost everything on the list.
No, I have not gotten that...
By now, all the designer label and fashionable ones are sold out!
She is a girl, so that will not do!
Fine, I will look this weekend.
Dai-chan, are you going to really raise Rin-chan?
After all, you transferred to another section, right?
I have not really thought ahead that far...
Now I will do your hair!
Mothers and daughters are like friends.
Come to think of it, Mom and Kazumi are like buddies, too...
Who is to say that Masako-san's situation has not changed
and now she wants to live with her daughter?
Look at how many shots she is had...
If Masako found it, she would probably get rid of it.
Thus, I have taken this... roundabout method.
However, I do not really know the proper way to write a secret... riddle?
And this keyboard thing is making a fool of me,
so I cannot proceed at but a snail's pace.
Even so, these kanji conversion mistakes are dreadful!
Already, this feeble-minded old fool's energy is exhausted.
Therefore, I am giving up on this blog...
That is giving up too soon!
What happened to the greatest generation?!
To be continued in Rin's mother-child health record book...
Let me have a look-see here...
that the person who found this piece of paper thinks warmly of Rin,
I shall give an account here of Rin and her mother, Masako.
so I would like to start by saying that she is by no means a bad girl.
She says that she is a failure as a mother.
That she feels sorry for Rin.
Even now, she persists in being my maid.
And I believe that she will continue to do so.
I think of that as Rin's greatest happiness.
She is living a vigilant life, carefully leaving no traces of herself behind,
so that if something should happen to me,
her existence will be hidden from all of my relatives.
Masako certainly has a mother's love for Rin.
But she is still young and may not yet have the maturity to be a parent...
I do not really understand it...
But the one thing that is clear is he cared about Rin and her mother.
I want you to make my hair look like rabbit ears!
There is no way I can do it!
It is out of my league!
she said I was not cute!
Mii-chan said I was not cute at all!
I think Rin wins hands down...
I want to be cute, too...
She is already grown to be a fine girl
and that means her feelings can definitely be hurt...
Already, Rin's mind has developed a lot.
She is mature in some ways, in others not.
That is why an adult has to keep an eye on her.
It is a secret, so I cannot tell anyone at home about Parents' Day!
S-She is going to do it with that hairstyle?
How I wonder what you are.
thinking she would eventually even forget something painful like that...
Up above the world so high,
Like a diamond in the sky.
I have no scruples about hating you.
I want you to at least have had a good reason,
How I wonder what you are.
but what could be a good reason for abandoning a child?
But you are going to be using it for a long time, so we want something more...
A desk that looks like it is for a young lady would be better, do not you think?
One that is for a young lady is good!
Do I look like a young lady?
And I think you could still use the desk
even when you are a high school student.
Is a high school student an adult?
A girl went alone into a forest to play.
She lost her way and looked for the path to get back home,
but she just could not find it.
Suddenly, before she knew it, there was a tiny house in the forest.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
This is cute, is not it?
I told you not to run off on your own like that!
It can make me into a young lady!
